languages.text: Осироченные без его мудрого суда, опечалилися равно и насельники монастыря, и пришлецы незванные.
Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.
languages.original_text: Осироченные без его мудрого суда, опечалилися равно и насельники монастыря, и пришлецы незванные.

traits.locale_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, without his wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.
Left on their own, as orphans are, without his wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.
Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.
Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.
Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

languages.text: Abandonados como huérfanos y desprovistos de la sabiduría de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los habitantes del monasterio y los intrusos se sumieron en el pesar.
languages.original_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

traits.locale_text: Abandonados como huérfanos y desprovistos de la sabiduría de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, los habitantes del monasterio y los intrusos se sumieron en el pesar.

languages.text: 失去了行商浪人的贤明判断，无论是修士还是外来者都陷入了悲痛，仿佛被遗弃的孤儿一般。
languages.original_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

traits.locale_text: 失去了行商浪人的贤明判断，无论是修士还是外来者都陷入了悲痛，仿佛被遗弃的孤儿一般。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の賢明な判断を失って、孤児のごとく取り残された修道院の住民も、侵入者も、同じく悲嘆に暮れることとなった。
languages.original_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の賢明な判断を失って、孤児のごとく取り残された修道院の住民も、侵入者も、同じく悲嘆に暮れることとなった。

languages.text: Auf sich allein gestellt, wie es Waisen nun einmal sind, und des weisen Urteils {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} beraubt, befiel die Bewohner des Klosters und die Eindringlinge eine tiefe Traurigkeit.
languages.original_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

traits.locale_text: Auf sich allein gestellt, wie es Waisen nun einmal sind, und des weisen Urteils {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} beraubt, befiel die Bewohner des Klosters und die Eindringlinge eine tiefe Traurigkeit.

languages.text: Livrés à eux-mêmes tels des orphelins, privés du sage jugement {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les résidents du monastère comme les intrus sont gagnés par la mélancolie.
languages.original_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

traits.locale_text: Livrés à eux-mêmes tels des orphelins, privés du sage jugement {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les résidents du monastère comme les intrus sont gagnés par la mélancolie.

languages.text: Öksüz çocuklar gibi kendi başlarına kalan, Hür Tacir'in bilge yönlendirmelerinden yoksun manastır sakinleri ile mütecavizler, üzüntü içinde kaldı.
languages.original_text: Left on their own, as orphans are, bereft of the Rogue Trader's wise judgement, monastery dwellers and interlopers alike were in sadness.

traits.locale_text: Öksüz çocuklar gibi kendi başlarına kalan, Hür Tacir'in bilge yönlendirmelerinden yoksun manastır sakinleri ile mütecavizler, üzüntü içinde kaldı.
